content: First of all, over the last couple of years, we've gained a tremendous amount of new guests into the Target ecosystem. For us, we talk about own brands rather than private label because these are brands we've invested in for years. We build them, design them, create the packaging, the marketing materials, and they're hugely important to our strategy. So right now, our focus is to make sure our guests are aware of what we have and create a better, less frictionless experience, make sure that we deepen the loyalty with the consumer. First of all, over the last couple of years, we've gained a tremendous amount of new guests into the Target ecosystem. For us, we talk about own brands rather than private label because these are brands we've invested in for years. We build them, design them, create the packaging, the marketing materials, and they're hugely important to our strategy. So right now, our focus is to make sure our guests are aware of what we have and create a better, less frictionless experience, make sure that we deepen the loyalty with the consumer.
